# SelectorDialogOptions&lt;TStructure,TContainerStructure&gt;.AllowNone property

Whether to show the 'None' button, which allows the user to select nothing, in which case

```csharp
null
```

is returned as the result of the selector dialog. Default value:

```csharp
true
```

```csharp
public bool AllowNone { get; set; }
```
